import React from 'react'; const ReferralSection: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Section Header */}

Refer & Earn
Amazing Rewards

Help your friends and colleagues launch their tech careers while earning exciting rewards for yourself.

{/* Main Referral Card */}
{/* Background gradient */}
{/* Reward badge */}
Save ₹27,000

Referral Program

Share the opportunity, earn rewards

{/* How it works */}
1

Share Your Link

Share your unique referral link with friends and colleagues

2

They Enroll

When they enroll using your link, both of you get rewards

3

Earn Rewards

Get free courses worth ₹27,000 for successful referrals

{/* Rewards Grid */}

For You (Referrer)

  • 1 Student Referred: Microsoft Azure Free Course (₹7,000 value)
  • 2 Students Referred: Microsoft Azure Security Course Free (₹20,000 value)
  • Total Savings: ₹27,000

For Your Friend (Referred)

  • ₹2,000 discount on enrollment
  • Free career counseling session
  • Extended trial period
{/* Referral Link */}

Your Referral Link

{/* CTA */}
{/* Additional Benefits */}
🎁

No Limit

Refer as many friends as you want

⚡

Instant Rewards

Get rewards as soon as they enroll

🏆

Bonus Rewards

Extra rewards for top referrers

); }; export default ReferralSection;
